projects.name: ANTI-SLEEP ALARM SYSTEM
projects.description: An innovative system using Arduino UNO and IR sensors to boost driver safety. It actively monitors surroundings, detects obstacles and low-light conditions, and provides real-time alerts, reducing accidents and enhancing road safety.

projects.name: TRACE YOUR REFLEX VIA GAME
projects.description: To combat excessive screen time in children during lockdowns. We offer 3–4 games for under-5 years, boosting logical reasoning and reflexes and making learning enjoyable.

projects.name: ABSTRACTIVE TEXT SUMMARIZER USING PEGASUS
projects.description: Developed a website for abstractive text summarizer using Google’s state-of-the-art Pegasus model.

projects.name: IoT-Enabled Smart Helmet
projects.description: The IoT-Enabled Smart Helmet enhances motorcycle rider safety with three key features: alcohol detection to prevent drunk driving, drowsiness detection to keep riders alert, and helmet detection to ensure proper usage.

projects.name: Crack Identification in Bridge Infrastructure Using Machine Learning
projects.description: This project uses high-resolution camera-equipped drones and advanced machine learning to detect and classify structural cracks on bridges in real-time. It employs computer vision techniques to process vast image data, distinguishing between anomalies and monitoring crack progression. This innovation enhances bridge safety and provides essential insights into structural health.

education.institution: Mount Carmel Convent High School, Pune
Mahatma Phule International School and Junior College, Pune
